nodes.text: Spear Squadron was a starfighter squadron that flew TIE/LN starfighters in the service of the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. The squadron's TIEs had improved defensive systems at the expense of targeting capabilities and were flown by pilots trained to use group strategies and tactics.
Spear Squadron was represented by a miniature in the Imperial Power-up Pack supplement to the initial release of the Star Wars PocketModel TCG on June 19, 2007.
